text: {"insights":["Revenue grew 18% YoY indicating strong top-line growth driven partly by new enterprise deals improving ARPA","Customer churn increased significantly from 3.1% to 4.0%, representing a 29% relative increase in churn rate","Support tickets rose 25% following a pricing change, suggesting customer dissatisfaction with new pricing structure"],"risk":"The pricing change appears to be causing customer friction, evidenced by both increased support tickets and higher churn, which could offset revenue gains if not addressed","next_action":"Analyze support ticket themes related to pricing concerns and develop a retention strategy targeting at-risk customers before churn further erodes the revenue growth"}
